news.title: Delta's profit forecast tops estimates, buoyed by higher fares and resilient luxury demand
news.summary: Delta topped quarterly profit expectations and forecast a stronger-than-expected finish to 2025. Delta topped quarterly earnings expectations and said it will make a stronger than-expected profit in 2018. Delta also forecast a strong finish to the year.

news.title: Ferrari on track for worst trading day ever as guidance disappoints
news.summary: The targets were announced as part of the firm’s Capital Markets Day event. Analysts said the targets, which were announced, fell short of expectations.

news.title: Google launches Gemini subscriptions to help corporate workers build AI agents
news.summary: Google is augmenting its Agentspace product for easily building AI agents at work with new tools. Google is adding new tools for data science and customer engagement.

news.title: PepsiCo earnings top estimates as international markets fuel sales growth
news.summary: PepsiCo reiterated its full-year forecast. The food and beverage giant PepsiCo is one of the world's largest food and drink companies.

news.title: China tightens grip on rare earths supplies. The stocks involved in this crucial industry are surging
news.summary: Rare earths stocks were jumping Thursday. Rare earths are made from rare earths, which are found in the earth's core. The rare earth industry is worth an estimated $100 billion.

news.title: The bull market is turning 3 years old. Here’s where stocks are likely headed next.
news.summary: The tech-driven rally has started to broaden out. According to some on Wall Street, that should help power indexes like the S&P 500 even higher.

news.title: Want to avoid delayed flights and ruined trips during the shutdown? 6 steps for a smoother trip.
news.summary: Airports have already been plagued by delays because of the government shutdown. Travelers need to be prepared for possible delays and cancellations.

news.title: Jamie Dimon says there’s a 30% chance of a correction. ‘I’m far more worried than others.’
news.summary: The CEO of U.S. banking giant JPMorgan says most investors are not seeing the troubles that he is. Jamie Dimon: "I think we're in a good place. We're not there yet"

news.title: Google is looking to lock in an AI advantage with this move
news.summary: Google is betting that easy-to-build AI ‘agents’ are the key to unlocking the corporate market and boosting Alphabet shares.

news.title: PepsiCo’s revenue grows, as higher prices offset a continued drop in beverage volumes
news.summary: PepsiCo saw an earnings beat and an improved full-year outlook. Beverage volumes in North America extended their long streak of declines.
